text: (Aey Nabi, in mushrikeen se) kaho ke pukar dekho apne un maboodon ko jinhein tum Allah ke siwa apna mabood samajhey baithey ho. Woh na aasmaano mein kisi zarra barabar cheez ke maalik hain na zameen mein. Woh aasmaan o zameen ki milkiyat mein shareek bhi nahin hain.Unmein se koi Allah ka madadgaar bhi nahin hai
